# rUrgAra

rUrgAra is an internal package to Urg’Ara. It helps garanty uniformity
and ease of implementation of recurrent tasks performed in the company
as well as the implementation of Urg’Ara’s graphical chart.

## Installation

You can install the development version of rUrgAra from
[GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("https://github.com/Urgences-Ara/rUrgAra", build_vignettes = T)
```

## Example

Exemples of use are available in the “Getting started” vignette

``` r
vignette("Getting-started", package = "rUrgAra")
```

# Package index

## All functions

- [`UrgAra_colors`](UrgAra_colors.md) : UrgAra_colors
- [`UrgAra_cols()`](UrgAra_cols.md) : Extract any color from UrgAra
  globale palette
- [`UrgAra_palettes`](UrgAra_palettes.md) : UrgAra_palettes
- [`check_RPU_quality()`](check_RPU_quality.md) : Vérification de la
  qualité du RPU
- [`clean_FINESS()`](clean_FINESS.md) : FINESS code cleaning
- [`clean_commune()`](clean_commune.md) : Clean French commune names
- [`df_ex_charge`](df_ex_charge.md) : df_ex_charge
- [`fct_calc_delay()`](fct_calc_delay.md) : fct_calc_delay
- [`fct_convert_time_labels()`](fct_convert_time_labels.md) : Convertir
  une durée (en minutes) en étiquette lisible (jours/heures/minutes)
- [`fct_f_big()`](fct_f_big.md) : Format grand nombres
- [`fct_format_control()`](fct_format_control.md) : Controle values in a
  variable
- [`fct_make_icon_qual()`](fct_make_icon_qual.md) : Icon qualité des
  données
- [`format_p_value()`](format_p_value.md) : format_p_value
- [`get_template()`](get_template.md) : Extract template from rUrgAra
- [`make_pageGarde()`](make_pageGarde.md) : Page de garde UrgAra
- [`merge_complementary_variables()`](merge_complementary_variables.md)
  : Merge complementary variables
- [`pal_UrgAra()`](pal_UrgAra.md) : UrgAra color palette
- [`plot_add_logo()`](plot_add_logo.md) : Add company logo to a plot
- [`plot_delais_intervals()`](plot_delais_intervals.md) : Plot des
  délais entre points temporels
- [`plot_diag_charge()`](plot_diag_charge.md) : Plot a charge diagram
